means: 冒烟( smoke的过去式和过去分词 )

word_mean: curing 鱼品用木材（屑）烟熏或涂布熏液的加工方法。

sentence.Network_en: Legs of pork were cured and smoked over the fire.
Do you think it would be all right if I smoked?
David began to dislike all his television heroes who smoked.
sentence.Network_cn: 戴维开始讨厌所有他曾喜欢的吸烟的电视偶像了。

entry.tran: (玻璃)用烟处理过的，烟灰色的
entry.def: Smoked glass has been made darker by being treated with smoke.

example.ex: ...a white van with smoked glass windows.
example.tran: 装有烟灰色玻璃窗的白色货车

means.word_mean: 1. (used especially of meats and fish) dried and cured in wood smoke
